data.-except=foo,bar,baz: Build all builds other than these
data.-force: Force a build to continue if artifacts exist, deletes existing artifacts
data.-on-error=[cleanup|abort|ask]: If the build fails do: clean up (default), abort, or ask
data.-var 'key=value': Variable for templates, can be used multiple times.

Description:
Will execute multiple builds in parallel as defined in the template.
  The various artifacts created by the template will be outputted.
